name: GitHub Dark by Bane
description:
GitHub. Dark.
Others I've seen were sorta broken. This one shouldn't be, for a while anyway
additional_info:
Release!
- Dark!

Update 1:
- Missed some stuff, added
- Changed the colour scheme to one that, well, let's say should be more familiar

Update 2:
- Some icons were fixed to fit the theme
- Minor Github Docs changes
- Some BG elements were strange, so I fixed them

Update 3:
- Minor changes on GitHub's end led to minor changes her
- Activity heatmap view now updated again
- Issue comment box now updated again
- Minor icon changes
- Code Additions/Subtractions now styled

Update 4:
- "Created their first PR" image now dark
- Some analytic type stuff is now dark
- Protips now legible
- Dark more in-line with original colour heirarchy in areas
- Updated recent contributions (seems to change a lot...)

Update 5:
- Minor change to recent contributions... again. 
- Update to comment editing header
- Avatar-less users now have a Dark Avatar on their profile page

Update 6:
- Minor updates across the board
- Gists should now be covered by the theme
- Repo Heatmap should be covered appropriately now (they really change this a lot...)
- Some menus and fields were off, should be back to normal
- Oh yeah, I modified Quotes a bit so they're padding on the top and bottom now. I thought it looked neater overall, so I added it.
